snippet: Having decimated the publishing industry, slashed pricing in electronics and made the toy industry quiver, Amazon is taking on the high-end clothing business in its typical way: go big and spare no expense, reports Stephanie Clifford.
abstract: Having decimated the publishing industry, slashed pricing in electronics and made the toy industry quiver, Amazon is taking on the high-end clothing business in its typical way: go big and spare no expense, reports Stephanie Clifford.

headline.main: Amazon Plans Its Next Conquest: Your Closet
